info.title: Salesforce MCP
info.description: Comprehensive Salesforce connector covering Core REST API (SOQL, sObject CRUD, Search), Composite API, Reports & Dashboards, and Connect/Chatter APIs. MCP-enabled for Copilot Studio integration with dynamic sObject schema support.

get.description: Executes a SOQL query and returns matching records. Use for retrieving data from any Salesforce object.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: SOQL query string (e.g., SELECT Id, Name FROM Account WHERE Industry = 'Technology')

nextRecordsUrl.description: URL for next batch if done=false

get.description: Retrieves the next batch of records for a query that returned done=false.
Executes a SOSL search across multiple objects. Use for full-text search.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: SOSL search string (e.g., FIND {Acme} IN ALL FIELDS RETURNING Account(Id, Name))

get.description: Returns a list of all available sObjects in the org.
Returns detailed metadata about a specific sObject including fields, relationships, and record types.

parameters.name: sObject
parameters.description: API name of the sObject (e.g., Account, Contact, Lead)

post.description: Creates a new record in the specified sObject.

get.description: Retrieves a single record by ID.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return

patch.description: Updates fields on an existing record.

get.description: Returns JSON Schema for an sObject. Used internally for dynamic field population.
Returns the org's API limits and current usage.

post.description: Executes multiple API requests in a single call. Supports references between requests.

allOrNone.description: If true, all requests roll back on any failure

collateSubrequests.description: If true, independent requests execute in parallel

post.description: Executes up to 25 independent subrequests in a single call.
Creates a parent record and related child records in a single request.
Executes complex composite operations with dependencies between graphs.

get.description: Returns a list of reports available in the org.
Returns metadata for a specific report.

post.description: Executes a report and returns the results.

get.description: Returns a list of dashboards available in the org.
Returns dashboard metadata and current component data.

put.description: Refreshes all dashboard components to show current data.

get.description: Returns feed elements for a specified feed type.

post.description: Creates a new feed element (post) on a user's feed or a record.

subjectId.description: User ID or Record ID to post to

get.description: Returns a specific feed element by ID.

post.description: Adds a comment to a feed element.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID or 'me' for current user

get.description: Returns a list of Chatter users.
Returns a list of Chatter groups.
Returns details of a Chatter group.

post.description: Adds the current user as a member of the group.

get.description: Returns a list of topics in the org.

post.description: Model Context Protocol endpoint for Copilot Studio integration. Provides AI agents access to Salesforce operations as tools.
